channel.title: Hi can somebody please help me
channel.description:
hi i want to higher my exp in non combat skills. i am using a delta base server and i dont have anything to do with config.java
i only have my config folder so any ideas
i think its in client.java but i cant find it ive scanned over it countless times...
anyhelp much appreaciated
thanks

item.title: Hi can somebody please help me
item.dc:creator: @cLass1 .cLass
item.description:
@cLass1 wrote:

Since delta is so shitty, you will find the XP rates in the specific skills method.

For example, click on a tree. You will get the ID of the tree, search for that ID in client.java, and it will say “addskillxp” or something like that in that code.

Hope it helped, if you need additional help, PM me and I will teamview with you.

Read full topic
item.source: Hi can somebody please help me

item.title: Hi can somebody please help me
item.dc:creator: @fleminmj01 fleminmj01
item.description:
@fleminmj01 wrote:

lol im not looking for client.java m8 im looking to be able to change the exp rates. i said i been scanning client.java in the source and i can only find combat exp rates and not normal skill exp rates

can anybody help me

i can teamview if you would like to take a look so you know what i mean

i been looking for like 2 days now and still i cant find owt to do with normal skills…

Read full topic

Have you tried looking through your client folder… thats normaly were the client.java always is ( dunno about delta)
